item.title: Jax add a quote by Eden Bradley
item.description: "Fluid, lyrical and with a unique sensitivity to her characters, Jax Cassidy's work is as sensual as it is emotional. This is definitely an author to keep your eye on!" -- Eden Bradley

item.title: Jax add a quote by Sylvia Day
item.description: "Jax Cassidy is delightful! Her lush, lyrical way with words will draw you in and keep you turning the pages." -- Sylvia Day

item.title: Jax add a quote by Candace Havens
item.description: "Jax Cassidy's ART OF SENSUALITY is searing, erotic and sexy!" -- Candace Havens

item.title: Jax add a quote by Gemma Halliday
item.description: "Jax Cassidy is a brilliant new voice in contemporary fiction. Full of heat, seduction, and romance, her winning characters are sure to capture your heart and find a place on your keeper shelf." -- Gemma Halliday

item.title: Jax add a quote by Kayla Perrin
item.description: "Jax Cassidy serves up great sex with emotional intensity--what more can a reader want?" -- Kayla Perrin

item.title: Jax add a quote by Charlotte Bronte
item.description: "I have for the first time found what I can truly love–I have found you. You are my sympathy–my better self–my good angel–I am bound to you with a strong attachment. I think you good, gifted, lovely: a fervent, a solemn passion is conceived in my heart; it leans to you, draws you to my centre and spring of life, wrap my existence about you–and, kindling in pure, powerful flame, fuses you and me in one." -- Charlotte Bronte
